About Eric

Hello! I'm Eric, a passionate coding educator dedicated to teaching Python programming to children. With years of experience in both programming and education, I've developed a unique teaching approach that makes coding fun and accessible for young minds.

Teaching Philosophy

I believe that every child can learn to code. My teaching methodology focuses on:

  • Hands-on learning through interactive projects
  • Building confidence through achievable challenges
  • Fostering creativity and problem-solving skills
  • Creating a supportive and engaging learning environment

Experience

With years of experience teaching Python, I've inspired countless children to unlock their creativity through coding. My courses are tailored to each child's unique learning pace, making programming not just a skill but a fun and empowering journey toward becoming confident problem-solvers.
